text: ar hypotonia of the trunk - Myoclonus - Neonatal hypotonia - Nonketotic hyperglycinemia - Opisthotonus - Phenotypic variability - Seizures - Spastic tetraplegia - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database.
